greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A008277 * A000012.
comment: Corresponding to the generalized Stirling number triangle of first kind A049444. - _Peter Luschny_, Sep 18 2011
formula: A008277 * A000012 as infinite lower triangular matrices. Partial sums of A008277 rows starting from the right.
example: First few rows of the triangle are
mathematica: row[n_] := Table[StirlingS2[n, k], {k, 0, n}] // Reverse // Accumulate // Reverse // Rest;
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Feb 01 2008
